**SHARK NAVIGATOR LIFT-AWAY DELUXE - A NEW FRIEND OF YOUR FAMILY**

**Shark is a reliable vacuum cleaner manufacturer from the U.K. For many years, Shark has been the best-selling upright vacuum brand with high rating customer service. Recently, there has been a newly released product which is expected to satisfy even the most demanding customers. The product you are curious about is the Shark navigator lift-away deluxe nv360.**

**✷✷✷ This Content:** ![](https://imgur.com/efa5hL8.gif) [**Shark NV360 review**](https://lynk.id/sharknv360)

**Signature Shark navigator lift-away deluxe nv360 upright vacuum features.**

First, **Shark navigator lift away nv360** has a brush roll shutoff, which is designed for gentle floor cleaning. By easily switching off the spinning brush roll, now you can clean the floor made of materials whose scratch hardness is low. The manufacturer makes sure that this feature of Shark NV 360 will help to protect your floor and make it look shiny as long as possible.

![](https://imgur.com/4JrkHwq.jpg)

Second, **Shark - navigator lift-away bagless upright vacuum - blue** is equipped with a large-capacity **dust cup**. This provides a longer cleaning session throughout your whole home. Once you own this device, you can forget about having to stop in the middle to empty the dust cup. Now a continuous clean-up session has become possible with this blue Shark vacuum.

Last but not least, the **Shark navigator lift-away deluxe professional bagless vacuum** has an **anti-allergen complete seal technology**, which can capture and trap 99/9% of dust and allergens while preventing them from returning into the air. This function of purifying the air certainly improves the health of your family members.

●▬▬▬▬๑ ๑▬▬▬▬●●▬▬▬▬๑ ๑▬▬▬▬●●▬▬▬▬๑ ๑▬▬▬▬●●▬▬▬▬๑ ๑▬▬▬▬●

**➪➪➪ Read More:** [**Shark navigator lift away deluxe NV360**](https://www.apsense.com/article/why-you-should-let-the-shark-nv360-be-your-only-vacuum-at-home.html) ![](https://imgur.com/2fu9CPs.gif)

●▬▬▬▬๑ ๑▬▬▬▬●●▬▬▬▬๑ ๑▬▬▬▬●●▬▬▬▬๑ ๑▬▬▬▬●●▬▬▬▬๑ ๑▬▬▬▬●

**Versatile cleaning with Shark navigator lift-away upright vacuum.**

For traditional cleaning on carpets and hard floors, the upright mode is the most suitable and powerful. Lightweight and equipped with dynamic **swivel steering**, the Shark NV360 vacuum cleaner provides excellent control with easy maneuverability. You can move the device with a slight force and get a whole cleaning session done in the blink of an eye.

![](https://imgur.com/BK120Br.jpg)

As regards **carpeted stairs**, the Shark NV 360 offers a lift-away mode. You carry the pod in one hand and get a lightweight cleaning on stairs without having to carry a whole bulky vacuum cleaner along each stair. This will save you lots of energy and time. More importantly, you don’t have to be scared of any backache caused by bending and carrying too much weight.

Finally, for any above the floor cleaning, the lift-away mode also comes into use. You just need to lift away the pod and have the other hand do the overhead clean-up like bookshelves or ceiling fans. If you are female, then this function will allow you to do that physically demanding job alone.

**❁❁❁ See This Page:** ![](https://imgur.com/FJ0LyN6.gif) [**Shark Navigator NV360 reviews**](https://www.besport.com/post/32178368)

In conclusion, the **Shark navigator lift-away upright vacuum** is a perfect option for you to choose if you are looking for a device under $200 and powerful enough for different types of cleaning. Interestingly, if you invest in this home appliance, you will be given some accessories including upholstery tools and crevice tools. So, don’t hesitate any longer. You’d better head for the nearest store and bring **Shark navigator lift-away dlx vacuum cleaner** home immediately.
